General.Name: Design Milk Co Limited
General.Description: Design Milk Co Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the design, digital media, ecommerce, interior and architectural trade, and consumer industries in the United States. The company supports independent brands, emerging designers, destinations, design events, and products through content and e-commerce across art, architecture, interior design, furniture, fashion, and technology. It owns and operates various e-commerce Websites under the Design Milk and Kaufmann Mercantile brand names. The company was formerly known as AHAlife Holdings Limited and changed its name to Design Milk Co Limited in December 2020. Design Milk Co Limited was incorporated in 1988 and is based in Pickerington, Ohio.
